name: No Gravity (itch)
description:
This is a prototype / dying simulator for node movement system @ the September Berlin Minijam ( Made in 8 hours, the themes where Stranded and a World in the Sky )

Use W,A and D to move your astronaut around

Your space station exploded and your are stranded between space junk.

Use up your air supply to move around or wait to suffocate ....

Warning : This game does not has a happy end.

( This was primary a test for a 3D node movement system, press P to visualize the movement nodes )

Astronaut Breathing sound by Mike Koenig

Earth Model by Close Quater Games ( Unity Asset Store )
